summary: This is a standalone single set from the Witcher 2 Models by LOrdOfWar.  With his permission he has all his Witcher conversions free to use, so I created this for those who only wanted just this one set and not the whole collection of armors. Includes armor, gloves, and boots. Light Armor with crafting, tempering, and enchanting options. Recently a
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i63.tinypic.com/so4zo2.jpg[/img][img]http://i63.tinypic.com/2i1yulc.jpg[/img][img]http://i65.tinypic.com/259jt39.jpg[/img][img]http://i67.tinypic.com/m81yxt.jpg[/img]
Once again I'd like to thank LOrdOfWar for making The Witcher 2 Models. If you haven't seen it, that's the name, go check it out. This is just one set from his great collection.  I hope to move a few more over from that collection to single set esp's soon. For those of you out there like me who have a bit of a clutter in your forge and don't really want large collections but more of a diverse collection from multiple authors that's what I'll be working on. I have also recently added a long coat variation to the files. Special thanks goes to Patobek for letting me use a part of the "Armor of Intrigue" to make the Long coat.
author: iamonewhoplaysgames

files.name: Geralt's Raven Armor
files.changelogHtml: Uninstall version 1 before you get 1.1 Corrected minor texture issues and removed some unused textures that were left in the files by mistake.
